description_for_human: Search Austrian homes and rentals, summarize matches, and hand off to agents.
description_for_model: Use these actions to search Austrian real estate listings, list available providers, and summarize results for the user.

actions.name: listProviders
actions.description: Enumerate supported Austrian listing sources and their ingestion strategy.

region.description: ISO 3166-2 state code or 'AT' for whole-country coverage.

strategy.description: Limit to providers with a specific ingestion strategy.

actions.name: searchListings
actions.description: Search for Austrian property listings with lightweight filters. Returns stubbed data until ingestion is connected.

location.description: City, district, or landmark in Austria.

listingTypes.description: Desired listing intent such as buy, rent, or new-build.

actions.name: health
actions.description: Service liveness probe used by the Apps SDK.
